titles.title: CB 7 O Come, Let Us Sing For Joy to the Lord #7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O COME, LET US SING FOR JOY TO THE
LORD.
Let us shout joyfully to the Rock of our salvation.
Let us come before His presence with
thanksgiving. Let us shout joyfully to Him with
psalms.
O come, let us worship and bow down. Let us
kneel before the Lord our Maker. For He is our
God, and we are the people of His pasture and
the sheep of His hand.
